Headline: Linden-bound Purple & Kimball-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Purple & Brown Line trains running w/residual delays following an earlier track condition at Belmont. Service resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Linden-bound Purple & Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier track condition near Belmont.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 152 Addison buses are temp. rerouted via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains running w/residual delays & congestion following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at 54th/Cermak. Service resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at 54th/Cermak.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
